templates.name: SOLID Phase Delivery
templates.description: Phased delivery loop with SOLID-focused audits and mitigation steps.

steps.name: phase plan
steps.prompt: Please write up an end-to-end, SOLID-compliant plan for this work; a plan I can give to my AI CLI LLM agent locally to implement? I want to be able to paste it in phases - 1 at a time so I can review the work incrementally. And make the instructions somewhat flexible, since the local agent has a lot more context and may need to make pragmatic adjustments.

steps.name: implementation
steps.prompt: Sounds good. Please proceed with implementation.

steps.name: SOLID audit
steps.prompt: Please audit your work for compliance with SOLID principles.

steps.name: mitigation plan
steps.prompt: Please write a SOLID-compliant plan for addressing the issues you called out

steps.name: mitigation implementation
steps.prompt: Sounds good. Please proceed with implementation.

steps.name: test gap audit
steps.prompt: Please audit your work for gaps in test coverage. If no coverage tooling is available, check manually.

steps.name: test implementation
steps.prompt: Sounds good. Please proceed with implementation.

steps.name: quality checks
steps.prompt: Please run all relevant tests and quality checks. Run them iteratively, attempt to fix any issues that are fixable, then run the commands again to verify they are fixed. If you face any issues that are not reasonably fixable, document them and let me know.

steps.name: commit
steps.prompt: Please commit your work. Please keep your commits compliant with Conventional Commit structure (https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/)
